name: CP Phone Link
author: EasyCPMods

sections.description:
This plugin requires Classipress theme to be installed.

If you are an owner of a Classipress site, then you might have created a custom field for storing and displaying seller’s phone number. But this field is no special field, it just shows information like any other.

After you install this plugin, field with a phone number will become a link you can click on and if you are using your phone you will be able to dial the number directly.

You can even add an icon on the left or right side of the number. There are 12 icons to choose from, and you can add your own if you like. Just copy them to plugin images folder.

Feel free to download my other plugins:
Block User Ads
CP Author Online
Custom Field Data Icons
EasyCPMods Toolbox
Faster with Stats
Minimun Order Amount

EasyCPMods

A brief Markdown Example

Feature list:
Create a phone link on ads details page
Lightweight plugin
Enable or disable on desktop devices
Choose an icon for phone link
sections.installation:
1. Extract the folder into your WordPress plugins directory
  2. Enable the plugin
  3. Config the plugin under Settings->CP Phone Link
sections.changelog:
1.3.2

  • Corrected tel link

1.3.1

  • Phone ccon is now not shown if link is not active

1.3.0

  • Added new options for displaying hidden number and links and fixed a few issues

1.2.1

  • Fixed a bug that was displaying text with phone number

1.2.0

  • Added an option to hide thone number until clicked on.

1.1.0

  • Compatibility with EasyCPMods Toolbox plugin

1.0.2

  • Small update in the code

1.0.1

  • Minor update

1.0.0

  • Initial version

short_description: This plugin will add a link to a custom phone number field, allowing users to click on it and make a direct call from their phone.
